ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Draft') && (No_of_Assigned_Employees_count__c < No_of_Architects__c + No_of_Designers__c + No_of_Developers__c + No_of_Managers__c + No_of_Testers__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Requested No of Employees not available at the moment.
